response.overview: Too quick to decapitate, too fearful of turning to stone, we finally look up to meet Medusaâ€™s gaze.  Medusa, an iconic symbol of tragedy and transformation, captivates with her stone-turning gaze. A viral sculpture disrupts traditional portrayals, sparking societal reflection. One of the most body modified trans people in the world, Tiamat Legion Medusa shares their healing journey, while a diverse chorus of voices examines Medusa's myth. Celebrating her transformative power, this documentary invites audiences to redefine Medusa's narrative.
response.title: Medusa
